duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as both a functional and technical expert the development, upgrade, enhancement, and support of financial and administrative systems (Epic, 3M Solarity, M-Modal, Plato, Onbase and related HIM systems)
Independently maintain and manage large modules of an enterprise clinical information system or department specialty system
Facilitate decisions and work efforts which affect applications and patient care practices
Participate in the analysis and design of data communication links between systems

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Healthcare, IT, or related field (Master's preferred)
